com.xhive.dom.xlink.interfaces
Interface XhiveLinkBaseIf

All Superinterfaces:
Document, DocumentAS, DocumentTraversal, Node, XhiveDocumentIf, XhiveLibraryChildIf, XhiveLockingContextIf, XhiveNodeIf
public interface XhiveLinkBaseIf
extends XhiveDocumentIf

Represents an XLink linkbase. This class provides a DOM API to XLink information stored in DOM attributes.

An XhiveLinkBaseIf object extends org.w3c.dom.Document. You can obtain a linkbase object by casting an org.w3c.dom.Document to XhiveLinkBaseIf.

A linkbase is a document that is mainly used for storing link information. Usually, the linkbase contains only 'third-party' extended links. (c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Method Detail

getLinks

java.util.Iterator getLinks()
Returns a Iterator, containing all simple and extended links in the linkbase.
The iterator contains elements of class XhiveSimpleLinkIf or XhiveExtendedLinkIf.

Returns:
A Iterator, containing all simple and extended links in the linkbase.

getLinksByRole

java.util.Iterator getLinksByRole(java.lang.String role)
Returns a Iterator, containing all simple and extended links with an XLink attribute with name="role" and value="input string role".
The iterator contains elements of class XhiveSimpleLinkIf or XhiveExtendedLinkIf.

Returns:
A Iterator, containing all simple and extended links with an XLink attribute with name="role" and value="input string role".

getLinksByTitle

java.util.Iterator getLinksByTitle(java.lang.String title)
Returns a Iterator, containing all simple and extended links with an XLink attribute with name="title" and value="input string title".
The iterator contains elements of class XhiveSimpleLinkIf or XhiveExtendedLinkIf.

Returns:
A Iterator, containing all simple and extended links with an XLink attribute with name="title" and value="input string title".

getLinksBy

java.util.Iterator getLinksBy(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String value)
Returns a Iterator, containing all simple and extended links with an XLink attribute with name="input string key" and value="input string value".
The iterator contains elements of class XhiveSimpleLinkIf or XhiveExtendedLinkIf. For example, to retrieve all extended links, use: getLinksBy("type", "extended")

Returns:
A Iterator, containing all simple and extended links with an XLink attribute with name="input string key" and value="input string value".
